elementSpec.desc: describes the visual context of some part of a screen play in terms of what the spectator sees, generally independent of any dialogue.
観客の視点からの見た目を示す．

egXML.view: Max joins his daughter at the window. Rain sprays his face--
Max's POV He sees occasional windows open, and just across from his apartment house, a man opens the front door of a brownstone--

sp.speaker: Voice Over
sp.p: Monty Python's Flying Circus tonight comes to you live from the Grillomat Snack Bar, Paignton.

div.view: Interior of a nasty snack bar. Customers around, preferably real people. Linkman sitting at one of the plastic tables.

sp.speaker: Linkman
sp.p: Hello to you live from the Grillomat Snack Bar.

remarks.p: A view is a particular form of stage direction.
